column2: The  National  Police  Commission  has  decided  that  the  period  of  service  in  the
Reserve Force could be aggregated with the period of service in the Regular Force
Therefore, the eight years of service need not be after absorption to  the Regular
The  requirement  of  eight  years  of  service  need  not  be  eight  years  of  continuous
Even after discounting the break in service due to his interdiction, the Petitioner had
almost  sixteen years  of service and had satisfied the requirement  of having eight
years of service required for promotion.
